content.raw:
Some thoughts:

* The commented out Qt imports should be removed
* There are some error messages in `ImageSet` which seem to not have been updated from when the code was copied from my SLM segment class.
* Maybe the file and labscript class should be renamed `LightCrafterDMD`? I know that’s a pain so maybe we don’t bother…
content.html:
Some thoughts:

  • The commented out Qt imports should be removed
  • There are some error messages in ImageSet which seem to not have been updated from when the code was copied from my SLM segment class.
  • Maybe the file and labscript class should be renamed LightCrafterDMD? I know that’s a pain so maybe we don’t bother…
